taxon.author: Hann, 1990
taxon.distribution: Namibia, South Africa, Lesotho. Introduced to St. Helena, Australia, New Zealand

referenceObject.reference: Hann, S. W. (1990). A new combination involving Lithyphantes lepidus Cambridge 1897 and a new name for Teutana lepida Cambridge 1903 (Araneae, Theridiidae). New Zealand Journal of Zoology 17: 283.
